name: Armadillo - Curdle Jam
description:
This game was done for the Curdle Jam #30 Hosted by Curdle Games.

A funny short puzzle action game where you control an armadillo (who could have thought ??) that roll around to defeat crocodiles. 

You can destroy crocodiles only if you have a higher number of fruits. Also, fruits number grow only when you have doubles. (like 1+1 = 2 | 2+2= 3 | but 1+2 doesn't equal 3)

Have fun rolling around! 

Controls :

Keyboard : 
WASD or Direction arrows => Move around
Click/Space button => Dash
Escape => Restart level

GamePad/Joystick :
Left stick => Move around
Down or Left button => Dash
Start => Restart level

PLEASE SHARE YOUR SCORE+TIMER - I'm genuinely curious about them.
